title: Best early Black Friday deals (2022): Deals on TVs, tablets, robot vacuums, more
description: Black Friday may be a few weeks away, but if you look in the right places, you can find great deals now. Check out our list below to score some major savings on top tech items.

title: Best early smartwatch Black Friday deals 2022: Save big on Apple Watch, Galaxy Watch, and Fitbit
description: These days, you can get access to thousands of deals online -- nearly a month in advance of Black Friday. No more waiting in line at the stores. Check out these early Black Friday deals on smartwatches from the comfort of your own home this holiday season.

description: Your iPhone or Android phone can serve as a high-resolution webcam in a virtual meeting.

description: Looking for a tablet? The best tablets from brands like Apple and Samsung are already on sale ahead of Black Friday.

title: Best early Black Friday iPad deals 2022: Save big on the iPad Pro and the iPad Mini
description: Apple notoriously rarely has sales, but ahead of Black Friday, some iPad models are already discounted.

title: The 5 best Fitbits of 2022
description: The best Fitbits will help you stay plugged into your health with advanced activity-tracking and sleep sensors. ZDNET breaks down the top picks.

title: Singapore to pursue cross-border digital currency potential
description: Monetary Authority of Singapore will work with global partners, including Swiss National Bank and Banque de France, to explore the use of wholesale central bank digital currency for cross-border foreign exchange settlements.

title: Google showcases Native American art on Chrome for Native American Heritage Month
description: Google commissioned Native American artists to create meaningful art that will be displayed on Chrome collection themes and a Google Doodle.

title: How to schedule emails in MacOS Ventura
description: Here's an introduction to a new Apple Mail feature that allows you to compose an email and send it later.

title: Low-code no-code market keeps growing, and that means shifts in technology roles
description: Can there truly be a class of unfettered citizen developers, or is this just wishful marketing?

title: NASA's Artemis moon mission rocket will roll out to launch pad tonight
description: After three failed attempts, NASA prepares to finally launch the Orion spacecraft in two weeks.

title: T-Mobile is now selling a $325 Un-Carrier On suitcase
description: The brightly colored bag comes with a battery pack for charging devices and an Apple AirTag to help you keep track of it while traveling.

title: Google enhances its AI-powered flood and wildfire tracking systems
description: Using AI, Google can predict floods and wildfires, as well as track them in real time.

title: Eve, Nanoleaf and Amazon: Here's when you can expect Matter devices and software updates
description: Matter is a new smart home standard that has support from tech companies big and small, but when can you start using it?

title: Amazon to make Echo devices Matter-ready by December 2022

title: Microsoft Teams: Here's what Microsoft added in the last month
description: Microsoft continues to add new features to Teams. Here's its latest update.

title: Gmail can now help you track the packages you ordered online
description: Gmail will soon help users to track their packages in the post and tell them that a package is delayed.

title: I went to the zoo with a $2,500 camera and a Pixel 7 Pro. The results surprised me
description: This past weekend, I went to the Cheyenne Mountain Zoo with my Sony Alpha 7 IV and Pixel 7 Pro. By the time I left, I wondered why I even bothered bringing two devices.

title: Looking for a remote work job? It could be getting harder to find one
description: Organizations are beginning to scale back on hiring, so there are fewer remote roles to go around.

title: Raspberry Pi Pico has a problem with Macs using macOS Ventura

description: Robots can code their physical actions, in Python, when given instructions by humans.

title: Apple finally gives Safari Tab Groups the one feature it sorely lacked
description: Among the new Safari features that ship with MacOS Ventura, there's something that can take the browser's tab group feature to the next level.

title: Hybrid and remote workers feel disconnected from company culture. Here's how to fix it
description: According to Gartner, there are five ways managers can increase an employee's sense of connectedness to their company culture.

title: This Samsung soundbar, subwoofer is now less than $130 on Woot
